content.query:
-- How to read json 
SELECT 
    *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonObject NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )AS [result]

-- How to extract column_name and values using JSON_VALUE function
    SELECT 
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonObject, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonObject, '$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(20)) payment_type_desc
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonObject NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )AS [result]

-- How to fetch dataset in tabulor format using OPEN_JSON function
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)

SELECT payment_type,
       payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc VARCHAR(20)
    )
    AS [result]

-- How to Rename the column name
SELECT payment_type,
       information
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        information VARCHAR(20) '$.payment_type_desc'
    )
    AS [result]
